Text: The quality is so bad! And the subtitles are not removable, they're inlaid... not very convenient.
Not a very good quality. I would advise to go to another torrent.

Crap! I will be waiting closer to DVD release to download this as I always do. Im not the type to enjoy watching a movie that was meant for HD on a recording that was done some, old shitty VHS recorder...lol. Just sayin..lol.
